name: Contemporary Gods
description:
Modern gods are a little messier than history would have you believe...

The human world is falling apart, and the cracks have appeared even in the realm of the gods. As the deity of Unity, you are tasked with convincing the most troublesome gods--Social Media, Capitalism, and Identity--to work together for the benefit of humanity... Just one problem*: they all hate each other!

*there are actually  many problems

Features
  • Choose the main character's name, pronouns, and appearance
  • 3 LGBTQ-friendly love interests
  • Over 35k words
  • Extras gallery and deleted scenes to be added soon!

Made with Ren'Py for NaNoRenO 2021!

Characters Meet the Team
  • Fang - Writer
  • picofarad - Writer
  • ExistentialDev - Programmer
  • Nacchi - Sprite Artist
  • GoingGoingKeith - CG Artist
  • Rahul - UI Designer
  • Yvonne - Logo Designer, Promo Artist

Follow us on Twitter @4getmenotgames!
